languages.text: Бортовые исповедники сообщают о тревоге среди своей паствы: во время традиционной службы перед отправлением в варп-полет один из ритуальных светильников-стосвечников полностью потух. Миссионеры списывают это событие на незакрытые вытяжные установки, однако заметившие происшествие пустотники шепчутся о дурном знамении и скорых бедах на борту.

The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure, a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out at once. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.
languages.original_text: Бортовые исповедники сообщают о тревоге среди своей паствы: во время традиционной службы перед отправлением в варп-полет один из ритуальных светильников-стосвечников полностью потух. Миссионеры списывают это событие на незакрытые вытяжные установки, однако заметившие происшествие пустотники шепчутся о дурном знамении и скорых бедах на борту.

traits.locale_text: The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out as one. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure, a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out at once. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

languages.text: 船上的告解者报告了弥漫在信徒之间的不满情绪。航行开始前的例行布道中，某盏仪式吊灯上的一百支蜡烛忽然全部熄灭。传教士们认为这是由于某个被打开的通风井造成的，但某些注意到了这个异状的船员产生了别的想法。他们低声讨论说这是个不祥之兆，担心即将到来的灾难。
languages.original_text: The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure, a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out at once. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

traits.locale_text: 船上的告解者报告了弥漫在信徒之间的不满情绪。航行开始前的例行布道中，某盏仪式吊灯上的一百支蜡烛忽然全部熄灭。传教士们认为这是由于某个被打开的通风井造成的，但某些注意到了这个异状的船员产生了别的想法。他们低声讨论说这是个不祥之兆，担心即将到来的灾难。

languages.text: Los confesores de la nave informan del descontento entre su rebaño: durante el sermón tradicional antes de la partida, las cien velas de un candelabro ritual se apagaron a la vez. Los misioneros atribuyen este incidente a un conducto de ventilación abierto, pero los soldados del vacío se dieron cuenta y murmuran sobre un mal presagio, temiendo los males que puedan ocurrir.
languages.original_text: The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure, a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out at once. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

traits.locale_text: Los confesores de la nave informan del descontento entre su rebaño: durante el sermón tradicional antes de la partida, las cien velas de un candelabro ritual se apagaron a la vez. Los misioneros atribuyen este incidente a un conducto de ventilación abierto, pero los soldados del vacío se dieron cuenta y murmuran sobre un mal presagio, temiendo los males que puedan ocurrir.

languages.text: 船の贖罪司祭から、信者がざわついているとの報告があった。出発前の通例となっている説教中に、儀式用シャンデリアの100本のロウソクが一気に消されたのだ。宣教師達はこの件を喚起シャフトを開いたせいだと見ているが、ヴォイズマンはこの件に気付き、そのうち起こりうる事件を恐れる気持ちから、悪い前兆なのではと囁いている。
languages.original_text: The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure, a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out at once. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

traits.locale_text: 船の贖罪司祭から、信者がざわついているとの報告があった。出発前の通例となっている説教中に、儀式用シャンデリアの100本のロウソクが一気に消されたのだ。宣教師達はこの件を喚起シャフトを開いたせいだと見ているが、ヴォイズマンはこの件に気付き、そのうち起こりうる事件を恐れる気持ちから、悪い前兆なのではと囁いている。

languages.text: Les confesseurs font état d'un certain malaise parmi leurs ouailles : lors du sermon traditionnel qui accompagne le départ du vaisseau, toutes les bougies d'un chandelier rituel ont été soufflées d'un coup. Selon les missionnaires, l'incident serait dû à un conduit de ventilation mal fermé, mais les cosmomarins l'ont remarqué et considèrent l'événement comme un mauvais présage, craignant qu'un malheur ne soit sur le point de se produire.
languages.original_text: The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure, a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out at once. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

traits.locale_text: Les confesseurs font état d'un certain malaise parmi leurs ouailles : lors du sermon traditionnel qui accompagne le départ du vaisseau, toutes les bougies d'un chandelier rituel ont été soufflées d'un coup. Selon les missionnaires, l'incident serait dû à un conduit de ventilation mal fermé, mais les cosmomarins l'ont remarqué et considèrent l'événement comme un mauvais présage, craignant qu'un malheur ne soit sur le point de se produire.

languages.text: Die Konfessoren des Schiffs berichten von Unruhe unter den Gläubigen. Während der traditionellen Predigt vor der Abreise erloschen plötzlich gleichzeitig alle einhundert Kerzen eines rituellen Kerzenhalters. Die Missionare schreiben den Zwischenfall einem offenen Belüftungsschacht zu, doch die Raumfahrer flüstern von einem bösen Omen und fürchten, dass dem Schiff schlimmes Leid droht.
languages.original_text: The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure, a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out at once. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.

languages.text: Geminin günah çıkarıcıları, cemaatleri arasında hoşnutsuzluk olduğunu bildirdi. Kalkıştan önceki geleneksel vaaz sırasında ayin avizesinin yüz mumunun birden sönmesi, huzursuzluğa yol açmış. Misyonerler, bu olayı açık bir havalandırma boşluğuna bağlasa da uçsuz erleri bunu fark etmiş ve kötü bir alamet olabileceğine dair fısıltılar yayarak yaklaşan felaketlerden korkmaya başlamış.
languages.original_text: The vessel's confessors report discontent among their flock: during the traditional sermon before departure, a ritual chandelier's hundred candles were snuffed out at once. The missionaries attribute this incident to an open ventilation shaft, but the voidsmen noticed it and are whispering about an ill omen, fearing the woes that may soon come.
